title: Free Skin Preview is Legal to use in League Of Legends ,only you can see?
body: If I got a program like mod skin preview and I use on lol is legal  ore people say is safe and only you can see it , iso this true? {{champion:78}}

replies.body:
This party programs that interact with or modify the League files are in a **use at your own risk** category. Unless you write the program yourself, it's pretty hard to know if the program does or does not have hidden features that could give you a competitive edge.

Check out our official stance on these types of programs [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications). Let me know if you have any other questions.
